author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
The discussion of a Wayland only Fedora Workstation has come up before but now it's back once again, basically everything has been dealt with so now it's time especially as upstream is getting ready to do the same.

title: Time For Fedora Workstation To Go Wayland Only
